name: Urban Food Producer
description: Learn to grow food in small urban spaces like balconies, rooftops, and yards under 0.5 acres. Master container gardening, vertical growing, and intensive production techniques.
target_audience: City dwellers, apartment residents, small yards (0.1-0.5 acres)

name: Suburban Homesteader
description: Transform your suburban lot into a productive homestead. Learn food production, small-scale livestock integration, and how to maximize yields on typical residential properties.

name: Rural Regenerator
description: Restore and regenerate larger rural properties with ecosystem-first permaculture. Focus on water management, native species, and healing degraded land.
target_audience: Rural landowners with 2-20+ acres focused on restoration

name: Small Farm Operator
description: Run a profitable small farm using permaculture principles. Learn production agriculture, market strategies, and scaling polyculture systems for income generation.
target_audience: Small farmers (5-50 acres) seeking production income

name: Agro-Tourism Developer
description: Create educational farm experiences and visitor-friendly permaculture designs. Learn how to host workshops, farm stays, and build community around your land.
target_audience: Farms of any size interested in hosting visitors and education

name: Permaculture Student
description: Comprehensive permaculture education covering all topics in depth. The most complete learning path for those seeking mastery of permaculture design principles.
